alert.note: Alert for South Laramie Range; South Laramie Range Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued September 22 at 8:25AM MDT until September 23 at 3:00PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 PM MDT THIS AFTERNOON... ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TO 3 PM MDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...For the High Wind Warning, west winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. For the Dense Fog Advisory, visibility less than one mile in dense fog. * WHERE...South Laramie Range and South Laramie Range Foothills. * WHEN...For the High Wind Warning, from 3 AM to 3 PM MDT Friday. For the Dense Fog Advisory, until 2 PM MDT this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive. If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: South Laramie Range; South Laramie Range Foothills
